resources.string: <html> <body style="text-align:justify;">Considering Your Longitude and Latitude, probably You are nearby <b>Masdar Institute of Science and Technology.</body></html>
Acording to my observations, You could %1$s a little bit the phone\'s brightness, %2$s

You can call me Dr. Sensoration, I know all about Sensors: "What are they?" "Where are they?" "How are they working?". That is awesome, isn\'t it? Just slide the screen to see stunning usages of sensors in practice.
By the way, I have a Doctoral degree in Sensors Engineering !
